about_the_game:
About This Game

Work in a cemetery with a headless woman as your partner. Encounter and participate in rituals inspired by folklore legends from Latin America.

Complete the task of love—or don’t...

Survive the night and uncover multiple endings

new in town ready to work in this society that you dont belong, start working as a cemetery watchman

discover the tradition of this place, carry yours , learn about the dead ones,experiance emotions

that you thought you werent capable...

Features:

True Survival Horror Experience: You are no fighter - if you want to survive the horrors of the Cementery, your only chance is do your work and avoid the course

Hide and Sneak: Explore-based gameplay, with decition management elements

Unpredictable Enemies: Players cannot know when - and from where - one of the Cementery’s terrifying inhabitants will finally catch up to them

Bizarre Horror: grave desecrator’s setting and characters are inspired by real Leyends

stop motion style

About This Game

Work in a cemetery with a headless woman as your partner. Encounter and participate in rituals inspired by folklore legends from Latin America.

Complete the task of love—or don’t...

Survive the night and uncover multiple endings

new in town ready to work in this society that you dont belong, start working as a cemetery watchman

discover the tradition of this place, carry yours , learn about the dead ones,experiance emotions

that you thought you werent capable...

Features:

True Survival Horror Experience: You are no fighter - if you want to survive the horrors of the Cementery, your only chance is do your work and avoid the course

Hide and Sneak: Explore-based gameplay, with decition management elements

Unpredictable Enemies: Players cannot know when - and from where - one of the Cementery’s terrifying inhabitants will finally catch up to them

name: grave desecrator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: High-range Intel Core i3 / AMD A6 CPU or equivalent.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mid-range NVIDIA GeForce 200 / AMD Radeon HD 5000. Integrated Intel HD Graphics should work but is not supported; problems are generally solved with a driver update.
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: High-range Intel Core i5 / AMD FX CPU or equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: High-range NVIDIA GeForce 400 / AMD Radeon HD 6000. Integrated Intel HD Graphics should work but is not supported; problems are generally solved with a driver update.
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Work in a cemetery with a headless woman as your partner. Encounter and participate in rituals inspired by folklore legends from Latin America. Complete the task of love—or don’t... Survive the night and uncover multiple endings
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
